Jon Skeet wrote:

> I'll try to apply the code I'd written to the new
> Runner/Plan/Request architecture and let you know how I get on.

Please do--I'll be very interested to hear how things go.  You'll 
probably want to start with adapting to the new definition of Runner, 
and then implement getPlan()--not much else may have changed.  Thanks,

    David Saff
